Class MazeSolver

java.lang.Object
  MazeSolver

public class MazeSolver
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Tomasz Mroz Solves a maze inputted from a text file
Prints the path taken excluding any backtracks
Fully expandable

Constructor Summary
MazeSolver()
          Needed a nonstatic way to create the ArrayList Searches for the starting location and starts the game When finished finding the end the game prints the solution set in reverse order
